section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on June 9, 2024.*
section.heading: Sale of self-defense sprays.
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of this subchapter, a person may transfer, offer for sale, sell, give, or deliver a self-defense spray to another person in the District for the purposes set forth in § 7-2502.13; provided, that the self-defense spray is propelled from an aerosol container, labeled with or accompanied by clearly written instructions as to its use, and dated to indicate its anticipated useful life.
